items.title: Offcanvas components
items.description: Below is an offcanvas example that is shown by default (via .show on .offcanvas). Offcanvas includes support for a header with a close button and an optional body class for some initial padding. We suggest that you include offcanvas headers with dismiss actions whenever possible, or provide an explicit dismiss action.
items.code:
Offcanvas
Content for the offcanvas goes here. You can place just about any Bootstrap component or custom elements here.
